text: Brittany May "Britt" McHenry (born May 28, 1986) is an American ESPN personality. She is a commentator on Fox Nation, Fox News' 24/7 streaming service. She is the host of a show on WTTG Fox 5 in Washington, D.C. She was born in Mount Holly, New Jersey. On February 27, 2020, McHenry revealed she was diagnosed with a brain tumor. She had surgery on March 4, 2020. ==References== Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:American sports commentators Category:Journalists from New Jersey Category:American television presenters Category:Writers from Washington, D.C.
title: Britt McHenry
